{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TRENDnet |model=TEW-671BR |revision= |upc=710931600612 |ean= |asin=B002IW7ARY |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/09/2009 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Senao |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=S9ZTEW671BR, U2M-SR7750 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3052 |cpu1_cspeed=384 |cpu2_brand=Ralink |cpu2_model=RT2880 |cpu2_cspeed=266 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320CTTC-70G |fla1_num= |fla2=2 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX29LV160DBTI-70G |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM63A165TS-6G |ram1_num= |ram2=16 |ram2_brand=EtronTech |ram2_model=EM639165TS-6G |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, internal,, dual |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3052 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi2_chip1_model=RT2880 |wi2_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi2_chip2_model=RT2850 |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Richwave;RTC6691;;2; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Richwave;RTC6671;;2; |flags= |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.0.1.1;Ralink; |stock_os=Linux; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=TRENDnet671A,TRENDnet671N |default_ssid_regex=^TRENDnet671[AN]{1}$ |default_ip=192.168.10.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:14:D1 |oui_eth=00:14:D1 }} The device shares the same hardware as the [[EnGenius ESR7750|Senao / EnGenius ESR7750]]. As such, the FCC ID of that device has been assigned to this entry.
"7016A0266000 V1.00" is silkscreened on the board.
Note: This device uses the RT3052 as the main processor. The RT2880 is operating in '''iNIC''' mode (operating as a NIC remotely via its MII interface).
The default SSIDs for the device are '''TRENDnet671A''' and '''TRENDnet671N'''.
The included power adapter is a '''AMIGO''' AMS6-1201000SU (12V, 1A).
==Images== <gallery> File:TRENDnet_TEW-671BR_board_top.jpg|board top </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
